meanings.definition: A breed of large dairy cattle originating in the Netherlands.
meanings.sent1: Holsteins are known for producing a lot of milk.
meanings.sent2: The farm had many holsteins grazing in the pasture.
meanings.sent3: The holsteins had a party in the barn last night.
meanings.sent4: The holsteins stood out in the field like elegant giants.
meanings.sent5: The children loved visiting the holsteins and watching them being milked.

meanings.definition: Plural form of Holstein, referring to multiple individuals of the breed.
meanings.sent1: We saw a group of holsteins at the dairy farm.
meanings.sent2: The holsteins were peacefully chewing their cud.
meanings.sent3: The holsteins decided to form a band and play music.
meanings.sent4: The holsteins in the field resembled a patchwork quilt.
meanings.sent5: The farmer counted the holsteins to make sure none were missing.

meanings.definition: The black-and-white color pattern characteristic of Holstein cattle.
meanings.sent1: The holsteins' distinctive black-and-white coats were eye-catching.
meanings.sent2: The holsteins' markings made them easy to spot in the herd.
meanings.sent3: The holsteins wore tuxedos to the cow fashion show.
meanings.sent4: The holsteins' coats looked like a chessboard in the field.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a beautiful picture of the holsteins' unique patterns.
